library(tidyverse)
library(primer.data)
library(rstanarm)
cars <- read_csv(file = "Automobile.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
fit_obj <- stan_glm(data = cars, 
                    formula = mpg ~ cylinders +
                    displacement, 
                    family = gaussian, 
                    refresh = 0,
                    seed = 9)

fit_obj
